home.title: CosmoVid
home.intro: Download videos from TikTok, X (Twitter), and Instagram in HD. Free and fast. Choose a tool below to get started.
home.subtitle: Download TikTok videos in HD — with or without watermark. Free & fast.
home.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid TikTok URL.
home.downloadStarting: Your download will start in a moment.
home.step1: Open TikTok and copy the video link (share → Copy link).
home.step2: Paste the URL in the box above.
home.step3: Click "Get Download Links" and wait a moment.
home.step4: Choose MP4 (with or without watermark) and download.
home.metaTitle: CosmoVid - TikTok & X Video Downloader | Free HD Download
home.metaDescription: Download videos from TikTok and X (Twitter) in HD. Free, fast, no app required. MP4 download.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.howItWorksAnswer: Paste a TikTok video link in the box on the homepage and click "Get Download Links". We fetch the video and show you direct download links for MP4 (with or without watermark).
faq.legalAnswer: This tool is for personal use only. Respect copyright and TikTok's Terms of Service. Do not redistribute or use downloaded content commercially without permission. We are not affiliated with TikTok.
faq.metaDescription: How to use the TikTok downloader. Legal disclaimer and frequently asked questions.

about.title: About
about.intro: We provide a simple, fast way to download TikTok videos in HD — with or without the TikTok watermark.
about.contactText: For support or feedback, use the form below or email us.
about.metaDescription: About our TikTok downloader and how to contact us.

tools.title: Tools
tools.intro: Download TikTok videos in HD with or without watermark. Paste a link, get MP4 — free and fast.
tools.toolTikTokDesc: Download TikTok videos in HD as MP4. With or without watermark. Paste a link and get direct download — powered by yt-dlp.
tools.toolXDesc: Download videos from X (Twitter). Paste a post link, get MP4. Username, duration, and post name as filename — powered by yt-dlp.
tools.toolInstagramDesc: Download Instagram Reels, posts, and photos. Paste a link, get video or image — powered by yt-dlp.
tools.toolInstagramStoriesDesc: Download Instagram stories (video or photo). Paste a stories link. Note: Stories often require the account to be public.
tools.toolShrinkDesc: Compress videos to reduce file size. Max 100MB upload. Output: MP4, 720p, smaller size.
tools.metaDescription: TikTok downloader: download videos in HD with or without watermark. Free and fast.

shrink.title: Video shrinker
shrink.intro: Upload a video to compress it and reduce file size. Output is MP4 (up to 720p).
shrink.errorInvalid: Please choose a valid video file.
shrink.errorNetwork: Something went wrong. Please try again.
shrink.success: Done! Your file will download automatically.
shrink.metaDescription: Compress and shrink videos online. Reduce file size up to 100MB. Free video compressor.

tiktok.metaTitle: TikTok Downloader HD | No Watermark | CosmoVid
tiktok.metaDescription: Download TikTok videos in HD with or without watermark. Free TikTok downloader. MP4. No app required. Powered by yt-dlp.

x.placeholder: Paste X (Twitter) video post URL here...
x.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid X or Twitter post URL.
x.downloadStarting: Your download will start in a moment.
x.step1: Open X (Twitter) and find a video post. Copy the post link (share → Copy link).
x.step2: Paste the URL in the box above.
x.step3: Click "Get Download Link" and wait a moment.
x.step4: Click "Download video". The file will use the post title as the filename.
x.downloadStarting: Your download will start in a moment.
x.metaDescription: Download videos from X (Twitter). Free. Paste a post link, get MP4. Username, duration, post name as filename. Powered by yt-dlp.

instagram.placeholder: Paste Instagram post or Reel URL here...
instagram.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid Instagram post or Reel URL.
instagram.step1: Open Instagram and find a post or Reel. Tap share → Copy link.
instagram.step2: Paste the URL in the box above.
instagram.step3: Click "Get Download Links" and wait a moment.
instagram.step4: Download the video or photo. Carousel posts show each item separately.
instagram.metaTitle: Instagram Downloader | Reels, Posts & Photos | CosmoVid
instagram.metaDescription: Download Instagram Reels, posts, and photos. Free. Paste a link, get video or image. Powered by yt-dlp.

instagramStories.errorInvalid: Please enter a valid Instagram stories URL (e.g. instagram.com/stories/username).
instagramStories.step1: Open Instagram and view a story. Copy the stories link from your browser.
instagramStories.step2: Paste the URL in the box above.
instagramStories.step3: Click "Get Stories" to fetch and download.
instagramStories.authNote: Note: Instagram stories often require the account to be public. Private stories may not be available.
instagramStories.metaDescription: Download Instagram stories. Paste a stories link to save videos and photos. Public accounts only.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CosmoVid ("we", "our") respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our website and video downloader tools.
privacy.adsIntro: We may use third-party advertising companies, including Google AdSense, to serve ads when you visit our site. These companies may use information about your visits to this and other websites to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you.
privacy.adsPoint1: Third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on a user's prior visits to our website or other websites.
privacy.adsPoint2: Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads based on your visits to our site and/or other sites on the Internet.
privacy.adsPoint3: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings or the Network Advertising Initiative opt-out page at www.aboutads.info.
privacy.data: When you use our tools (e.g., pasting a video URL), we may process the URL and related metadata to provide the download service. We do not store your personal data for longer than necessary. Our advertising partners may collect data as described in their privacy policies.
privacy.contact: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us via the contact information on our About page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.accept: By using CosmoVid, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our site or tools.
terms.use: Our tools are provided for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not use them to download, redistribute, or commercially exploit content in violation of copyright or platform terms (e.g., TikTok, X/Twitter). You are responsible for complying with applicable laws and third-party terms.
terms.disclaimer: CosmoVid is not affiliated with TikTok, X (Twitter), or any other third-party platform. We provide tools "as is" without warranties. We are not responsible for how you use downloaded content or for any damages arising from use of our site.
terms.changes: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.contact: For questions about these Terms, contact us via the About page.

blog.title: Blog
blog.intro: Tips, guides, and updates about video downloaders and our tools.
